<h1>
  Todo application
</h1>

Simple todo application built with Gatsby framework.

[VIEW DEMO](http://165.22.213.22:9000/)

##  Purpose

* Learn the Gatsby framework by building simple app
* Learn deploying the Gatsby todo app to hosting server.
